ist Lochan was a member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fist Lochan was an dark-skinned human woman with brown eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist a helmet, a set of chainmail, and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. Lochan wielded a halberd.
In the , Fist Lochan was stationed in the Rivington district of Baldurs Gate, beyond the Wyrms Crossing fortress. During he Absolute crisis, Lochan, had to deal with Baldurian protesters, who zealously expressed their disdain for the refugees, who flooded the city, displaced by the moving armies of the Absolute. One of the protestors who gave her hard time was Saer Grotpoll, who railed the crowds, claiming that the refugee vermin horde was a danger that could over overwhelm the city and that Baldurs Gate was for Baldurians.
